name: FLY FOR FUN s.r.o.
about: FLY FOR FUN s.r.o., founded in 1995, is one of the largest and most prestigious flying schools in the Czech Republic. Located near Sazená, 23 kilometers south of Prague, our school offers a wide range of pilot training programs, including Ultralight (ULLa), LAPL(A), LAPL(H), PPL(A), PPL(H), CPL(A), CPL(H), FI, MEP, MCC, and IR licenses. Our instructors, comprising ex-fighter pilots, airline pilots, and pilots from air rescue services, bring extensive experience and a passion for flying. With a fleet of 10 aircraft and type ratings on Robinson R22 and R44 helicopters, we provide comprehensive training in a friendly and professional environment. Our instructors speak English, and we have accumulated over 90,000 flight hours. We pride ourselves on tailored lessons, a supportive atmosphere, and a commitment to ensuring our students become skilled and safe pilots. Choose FLY FOR FUN s.r.o. for a superior flying education and a lifelong passion for aviation.
